CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or Update Database Migration resource.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Create or Update Database Migration resource.

OtherOperations.Name: Cancel
OtherOperations.Description: Stop on going migration for the database.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieve the specified database migration for a given SQL Managed Instance.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create a new database migration to a given SQL Managed Instance.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Create a new database migration to a given SQL Managed Instance.

OtherOperations.Name: Cancel
OtherOperations.Description: Stop in-progress database migration to SQL Managed Instance.

OtherOperations.Name: Cutover
OtherOperations.Description: Initiate cutover for in-progress online database migration to SQL Managed Instance.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieve the specified database migration for a given SQL VM.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create a new database migration to a given SQL VM.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Create a new database migration to a given SQL VM.

OtherOperations.Name: Cancel
OtherOperations.Description: Stop in-progress database migration to SQL VM.

OtherOperations.Name: Cutover
OtherOperations.Description: Initiate cutover for in-progress online database migration to SQL VM.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or Update Database Migration Service.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Retrieve all SQL migration services in the resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetSqlMigrationServices
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Retrieve all SQL migration services in the subscriptions.

OtherOperations.Name: GetAuthKeys
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieve the List of Authentication Keys for Self Hosted Integration Runtime.

OtherOperations.Name: RegenerateAuthKeys
OtherOperations.Description: Regenerate a new set of Authentication Keys for Self Hosted Integration Runtime.

OtherOperations.Name: DeleteNode
OtherOperations.Description: Delete the integration runtime node.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMigrations
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieve the List of database migrations attached to the service.

OtherOperations.Name: GetMonitoringData
OtherOperations.Description: Retrieve the registered Integration Runtime nodes and their monitoring data for a given Database Migration Service.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. The GET method retrieves information about a service instance.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. The PUT method creates a new service or updates an existing one. When a service is updated, existing child resources (i.e. tasks) are unaffected. Services currently support a single kind, "vm", which refers to a VM-based service, although other kinds may be added in the future. This method can change the kind, SKU, and network of the service, but if tasks are currently running (i.e. the service is busy), this will fail with 400 Bad Request ("ServiceIsBusy"). The provider will reply when successful with 200 OK or 201 Created. Long-running operations use the provisioningState property.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. The PATCH method updates an existing service. This method can change the kind, SKU, and network of the service, but if tasks are currently running (i.e. the service is busy), this will fail with 400 Bad Request ("ServiceIsBusy").

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. The DELETE method deletes a service. Any running tasks will be canceled.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: The Services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. This method returns a list of service resources in a resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetDataMigrationServices
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. This method returns a list of service resources in a subscription.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: CheckNameAvailabilityService
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: This method checks whether a proposed top-level resource name is valid and available.

OtherOperations.Name: CheckStatus
OtherOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. This action performs a health check and returns the status of the service and virtual machine size.

OtherOperations.Name: Start
OtherOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. This action starts the service and the service can be used for data migration.

OtherOperations.Name: Stop
OtherOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. This action stops the service and the service cannot be used for data migration. The service owner won't be billed when the service is stopped.

OtherOperations.Name: GetSkus
OtherOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. The skus action returns the list of SKUs that a service resource can be updated to.

OtherOperations.Name: CheckChildrenNameAvailability
OtherOperations.Description: This method checks whether a proposed nested resource name is valid and available.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The GET method retrieves information about a task.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The PUT method creates a new task or updates an existing one, although since tasks have no mutable custom properties, there is little reason to update an existing one.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The PATCH method updates an existing task, but since tasks have no mutable custom properties, there is little reason to do so.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The DELETE method deletes a task, canceling it first if it's running.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. This method returns a list of tasks owned by a service resource. Some tasks may have a status of Unknown, which indicates that an error occurred while querying the status of that task.

OtherOperations.Name: Cancel
OtherOperations.Description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. This method cancels a task if it's currently queued or running.

OtherOperations.Name: Command
OtherOperations.Description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. This method executes a command on a running task.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The service tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The GET method retrieves information about a service task.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The service tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The PUT method creates a new service task or updates an existing one, although since service tasks have no mutable custom properties, there is little reason to update an existing one.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The service tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The PATCH method updates an existing service task, but since service tasks have no mutable custom properties, there is little reason to do so.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The service tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The DELETE method deletes a service task, canceling it first if it's running.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Database Migration Service. This method returns a list of service level tasks owned by a service resource. Some tasks may have a status of Unknown, which indicates that an error occurred while querying the status of that task.

OtherOperations.Name: Cancel
OtherOperations.Description: The service tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. This method cancels a service task if it's currently queued or running.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. The GET method retrieves information about a project.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. The PUT method creates a new project or updates an existing one.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. The PATCH method updates an existing project.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. The DELETE method deletes a project.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. This method returns a list of projects owned by a service resource.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The files resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing a file stored under the project resource. This method retrieves information about a file.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The PUT method creates a new file or updates an existing one.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: This method updates an existing file.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. This method returns a list of files owned by a project resource.

OtherOperations.Name: Read
OtherOperations.Description: This method is used for requesting storage information using which contents of the file can be downloaded.

OtherOperations.Name: ReadWrite
OtherOperations.Description: This method is used for requesting information for reading and writing the file content.
